description.x-y:
Striking opponents over and over makes
the user’s fists harder.
Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
